definition: to try hard to/to strive to
surname Li
power/force/strength/ability/strenuously
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: Adorno attempts to build real nature aesthetics.
sentences.chinese: 阿多诺力图建立真正的自然美学。

sentences.english: Formally the house seeks to be a solid with the least possible subtractions.
sentences.chinese: 形式上别墅力图成为一个削减最少的立方体。

sentences.english: The little ship tried to escape when the big pirate ship bore down on it.
sentences.chinese: 那条大海盗船逐渐逼近时，小船力图摆脱。

sentences.english: The richness and Perfectibility of this thesis are ensured, as far as possible, under current conditions.
sentences.chinese: 在现有研究条件下尽量力图文章的充实与完善。

sentences.english: We sought to parry the charateristic soviet lunge with fancy footwork.
sentences.chinese: 我们以花式步法力图避开典型的苏联冲刺。

sentences.english: The Graphic Methodintroduced in the paper is easy for students to master.
sentences.chinese: 用本文叙述的图解法作剪力图和弯矩图学生易于掌握。

sentences.english: Washington seeks to re-balance its military and economic interests there.
sentences.chinese: 美国力图再平衡其亚洲的军事和经济利益。

sentences.english: The government tried to remit the urban residents into stability.
sentences.chinese: 政府力图使城镇居民恢复安定生活。

sentences.english: This paper is based on historical material of the Tang dynasty and tries to clarify the question.
sentences.chinese: 本文从唐朝的史料出发，力图就此问题进行考察。

sentences.english: The justice society is a perfect Utopia that jurists seek to construct.
sentences.chinese: 法律社会是法律学者力图构建的应然美好的正义之邦。

sentences.english: But local and regional propaganda authorities are still trying to keep the matter quiet.
sentences.chinese: 但当地各级宣传机构依然在力图让这件事情平息下来。

sentences.english: There is more in Mary's refusal than meets the eye; I think she's trying to hide something.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽的拒绝另有隐情，我想她是在力图隐瞒什么东西。

sentences.english: The detective tried to ascertain the facts about the robbery.
sentences.chinese: 这个侦察员力图弄清这一盗窃案的事实真象。

sentences.english: There's more in Mary's refusal than meets the eye; I think she's trying to hide something.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽的拒绝另有隐情，我想她是在力图隐瞒什么东西。

sentences.english: The author seems to strain after novelty.
sentences.chinese: 作者似乎在力图标新立异。

sentences.english: She endeavours to keep things neat in her apartment.
sentences.chinese: 她力图把她房间里的一切东西保持整洁。

definition: to make every effort to/striving to do one's best
in order to/hoping to/attempting to/waiting for
to do one's utmost
in order to
to attempt/to try
so as to/for the purpose of/in order to
to have as its purpose/to be intended to/to aim to (do sth)
as far as possible/to do one's utmost
with this/thereby/thus/because of this
to work hard for/to do all one can/to contend strongly
to make a supreme effort/at all costs
using this as a pretext/thereby
to spare no effort (idiom); to do one's utmost
to put effort into sth/to try really hard
to advance together
foothold
